meanings.definition: The quality or state of being dutiful.
meanings.sent1: Her dutifulnesses towards her family was evident in the way she always put their needs first.
meanings.sent2: The teacher praised the student for showing dutifulnesses in completing all assignments on time.
meanings.sent3: The dutifulnesses of the dog to fetch the ball every time amused the children endlessly.
meanings.sent4: The dutifulnesses of the sun to rise every morning is a reminder of the consistency of nature.
meanings.sent5: The dutifulnesses of the soldier to follow orders without question was truly admirable.

meanings.definition: The act of performing one's duties with respect and obedience.
meanings.sent1: His dutifulnesses in attending to his sick grandmother every day showed his caring nature.
meanings.sent2: The employee's dutifulnesses in completing all tasks assigned to him earned him a promotion.
meanings.sent3: The dutifulnesses of the robot to clean the house without complaint was both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The dutifulnesses of the wind to carry the seeds far and wide is essential for plant reproduction.
meanings.sent5: The dutifulnesses of the nurse to care for her patients with compassion was truly heartwarming.
